info.brief_description: Bulma invents a gun that every girl wants
info.description:
Revival of an old GTS story that I really liked.
Old bio: Generally the story is that Bulma invents a gun that can change a person in anyway. So word gets out and everyone wants it because it never runs out of energy. Now Android 18, Chi Chi, Videl, Pan, Bra and any one else you want to make up. Now this gun can: grow, shrink, change breast size, change butt size, change age, Imortality, fat expansion, muscle and anyone other feature that you can think of.
